quote: Cryptic Dad is cryptic,' I muttered ... We'd hung out all day today. Was there no time in there he could have said, 'Oh, hey, meet me at the magical bookcase at the butt-crack of dawn tomorrow, cool?
quote_letters: CRYPTIC DAD IS CRYPTIC I MUTTERED WED HUNG OUT ALL DAY TODAY WAS THERE NO TIME IN THERE HE COULD HAVE SAID OH HEY MEET ME AT THE MAGICAL BOOKCASE AT THE BUTT-CRACK OF DAWN TOMORROW COOL
